name: "Anna Studies the Blade"
description:
Developed in 3 days for a "project a week" sprint

Anna takes to the mountains for her training of her own, preparing to defend both Northuldra and Arendelle from whatever lies beyond.

Click on snowflakes to cut them from the sky.

Siren call originally from Frozen 2

Mountain breeze from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mtmB30Prqvs

Mountain Image from Frozen 2 promo art

Anna sprite, sword effect, snowflake all by me, Jason.
